mods.abstract: NOTICE. COMMITTED to Jail at Marksville, a runaway negro man, who says his name is JOHN and says belongs to Mr. STOCKER of Natchitoches Par. Said boy is about 38 years old, 5 feet 5 inches high. The owner is notified to come forward, prove property, pay charges, and take him away or he will be dealt with according to law. DORA GUILLOT, JAILOR. feb 28.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
